effect:
**Inherited Effect** — Chessman Command attack cards you activate enter the intent with +1[POWER].

**Lineage Release** — For each awake Chessman ally you control, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to that ally this turn.

effect:
**On Enter**: You gain the Servile Possessions mastery.

**Inherited Effect** — At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card from your graveyard or hand and put an **omen** counter on it.
effect_raw:
On Enter: You gain the Servile Possessions mastery.

Inherited Effect — At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card from your graveyard or hand and put an omen counter on it.
flavor: "Miss Alice, I am at your service."
name: Ciel, Loyal Valet

rule.description: Cards in banishment with omen counters on them are omens.

effect_html: On Enter: You gain the Servile Possessions mastery.Inherited Effect — At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card from your graveyard or hand and put an omen counter on it.

effect:
**Ciel Lineage**

**On Enter**: For each omen you have, discard a card from your hand or memory and draw a card into your memory.

**Lineage Release** — You may activate one of your omens. Activate this ability only if you have six or more omens.
effect_raw:
Ciel Lineage

On Enter: For each omen you have, discard a card from your hand or memory and draw a card into your memory.

Lineage Release — You may activate one of your omens. Activate this ability only if you have six or more omens.
name: Ciel, Omenbringer

rule.description: Cards in banishment with omen counters on them are omens.
Each discard and draw into memory are separate actions, you can discard a card you drew into memory with this effect.

effect_html: Ciel LineageOn Enter: For each omen you have, discard a card from your hand or memory and draw a card into your memory.Lineage Release — You may activate one of your omens. Activate this ability only if you have six or more omens.

effect:
Devouring Malice enters the field with **X** **charge** counters on it.

[REST], Remove a **charge** **counter from Devouring Malice**: As a Spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen—
• Put three **charge** counters on target ally.
• Deal 3 damage to target champion and **recover 3**.
• Deal 8 unpreventable damage to your champion and draw two cards.
effect_raw:
Devouring Malice enters the field with X charge counters on it.

REST, Remove a charge counter from Devouring Malice: As a Spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen—
• Put three charge counters on target ally.
• Deal 3 damage to target champion and recover 3.
• Deal 8 unpreventable damage to your champion and draw two cards.
name: Devouring Malice
effect_html: Devouring Malice enters the field with X charge counters on it., Remove a charge counter from Devouring Malice: As a Spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen— • Put three charge counters on target ally. • Deal 3 damage to target champion and recover 3. • Deal 8 unpreventable damage to your champion and draw two cards.

effect:
As long as you control another Suited ally, Noire has **stealth**.

**On Enter**: Depending on the total reserve cost of Suited objects you control—
• 6— Put a **buff** counter on Noire.
• 10— Put two **buff** counters on Noire.
• 21— Put four **buff** counters on Noire.

As long as you control another Suited ally, Noire has stealth.

• 21— Put four buff counters on Noire.

effect:
**Kindle 6**

***Cardistry*** — (6): Banish a fire element action card with reserve cost 2 or less from your graveyard. If you do, copy it and you may activate that copy without paying its reserve cost. This ability costs (1) less to activate for each Suited object you control with different reserve costs. Activate this ability only once.
effect_raw:
Kindle 6

Cardistry — (6): Banish a fire element action card with reserve cost 2 or less from your graveyard. If you do, copy it and you may activate that copy without paying its reserve cost. This ability costs (1) less to activate for each Suited object you control with different reserve costs. Activate this ability only once.
name: Duchess, Six of Hearts

rule.description: The "activate this ability only once" applies to each instance of a Cardistry ability on a card. If you have multiple copies of a card with the same Cardistry ability in play, each one can activate its ability one time.

effect_html: Kindle 6Cardistry — 6: Banish a fire element action card with reserve cost 2 or less from your graveyard. If you do, copy it and you may activate that copy without paying its reserve cost. This ability costs 1less to activate for each Suited object you control with different reserve costs. Activate this ability only once.

effect:

effect:
You may banish three or more Suited ally cards with total reserve cost 10 from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost.

Other Suited allies you control have **immortality**.

**On Death**: Suited allies you control get +1[POWER] until the end of your next turn.
effect_raw:
You may banish three or more Suited ally cards with total reserve cost 10 from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost.

Other Suited allies you control have immortality.

On Death: Suited allies you control get +1POWER until the end of your next turn.

effect:
[Level 1+] **On Enter**: Rest target champion. It doesn't wake up during its controller's next wake up phase.

[Level 1+] If a rested champion you don't control would level up into a champion card, return that card to its owner's material deck instead.
effect_raw:
[Level 1+] On Enter: Rest target champion. It doesn't wake up during its controller's next wake up phase.

[Level 1+] If a rested champion you don't control would level up into a champion card, return that card to its owner's material deck instead.
name: Snow White, Weiss Queen
effect_html: Level 1+ On Enter: Rest target champion. It doesn't wake up during its controller's next wake up phase.Level 1+ If a rested champion you don't control would level up into a champion card, return that card to its owner's material deck instead.

**Fast Activation**

Fast Activation

effect: For the rest of the game, **time is distorted**. *(As long as **time is distorted**, each player skips their first materialize phase and they get an additional materialize phase after their main phase each turn.)*
effect_raw: For the rest of the game, time is distorted. (As long as time is distorted, each player skips their first materialize phase and they get an additional materialize phase after their main phase each turn.)
flavor: “If you could turn back time, would you?”
name: Chronowarp

rule.description: If a player resolves a Chronowarp a second time, because time is distorted already, nothing happens.

effect_html: For the rest of the game, time is distorted. (As long as time is distorted, each player skips their first materialize phase and they get an additional materialize phase after their main phase each turn.)

effect:

(2): Until end of turn, Humpty Dumpty becomes an ally in addition to its other types with base power and life 0.

As long as you have three or more  **omens** with different reserve costs, this card costs 3 less to activate.

Your omens have ”Whenever an opponent activates a card with the same reserve cost as this **omen**, **recover 1** and deal 1 damage to their champion.”

effect:
**On Enter**: As a Spell, deal 3 damage to target unit. Then you may banish a card from your hand or memory face down.

(2), [REST],  **Reveal a card banished by Spirelle with reserve cost X**: **Negate** each activation of cards with reserve cost **X**. Put each card **negated** this way and each card banished by Spirelle into their owner's memories. Then trigger each of Spirelle's  **on enter** abilities.
effect_raw:
On Enter: As a Spell, deal 3 damage to target unit. Then you may banish a card from your hand or memory face down.

(2), REST,  Reveal a card banished by Spirelle with reserve cost X: Negate each activation of cards with reserve cost X. Put each card negated this way and each card banished by Spirelle into their owner's memories. Then trigger each of Spirelle's  on enter abilities.
name: Spirelle, Schwartz Queen

rule.description: If Spirelle dies while a card is banished under her abilities, that card will remain banished.
Revealing a facedown banished card is a cost to activate Spirelle's ability.

effect_html: On Enter: As a Spell, deal 3 damage to target unit. Then you may banish a card from your hand or memory face down.2,, Reveal a card banished by Spirelle with reserve cost X: Negate each activation of cards with reserve cost X. Put each card negated this way and each card banished by Spirelle into their owner's memories. Then trigger each of Spirelle's on enter abilities.
